description: This file appears to be a shell script for managing log uploads, telemetry, and system maintenance tasks. It contains functions for scheduling, log handling, and system checks, and is likely part of a maintenance or system management component.

methods.name: calcRandTimeandUpload
methods.description: Calculates random hours, minutes, and seconds for scheduling log uploads; performs delay, creates system descriptor, and manages various logs and services.

methods.name: getBuildType
methods.description: Determines the build type of the device (DEV, VBN, PROD, CQA) based on the version.txt.

methods.name: getTFTPServer
methods.description: Retrieves the TFTP server address based on build type from a configuration file.
